Text.desc: When you click on a link it will take you to a website. To download the extension just click the green "install" button and it will open in VSCode.
Text.desc2: These are VSCode Extensions that I think would be worth downloading.
Text.email: Email yourself all these download links.

Extensions.Name: Live Server
Extensions.Author: Ritwick Dey
Extensions.Description: Allows you to preview a website you're developing in real time. Updates automatically when you make changes.

Extensions.Name: Atom One Dark Theme
Extensions.Author: Mahmoud Ali
Extensions.Description: This is my favorite color theme, and I added a lot to it in my VSCode settings.json file.

Extensions.Name: Vite
Extensions.Author: Anthony Fu
Extensions.Description: Good for Vite Support in your projects.

Extensions.Name: Vue - Official
Extensions.Author: Vue
Extensions.Description: Good for Vue Framework support.

Extensions.Name: SQLTools
Extensions.Author: Matheus Teixeira
Extensions.Description: This extension is super good for working with MySQL/Postgres databases.

Extensions.Name: SQLite Viewer
Extensions.Author: Florian Klampfer
Extensions.Description: Allows you to view SQLite databases as a table.

Extensions.Name: SQLite
Extensions.Author: alexcvzz
Extensions.Description: Allows you to query SQLite databases using SQL.

Extensions.Name: Docker
Extensions.Author: Microsoft
Extensions.Description: Makes it easy to create, manage, and debug containerized applications.

Extensions.Name: GitHub Copilot
Extensions.Author: GitHub
Extensions.Description: AI pair programmer tool for code generation. I personally prefer ChatGPT but this could probably be useful.

Extensions.Name: Excel Viewer
Extensions.Author: GrapeCity
Extensions.Description: Allows you to view excel files in VSCode.

Extensions.Name: Spring Boot Tools
Extensions.Author: VMware
Extensions.Description: Provides support for Spring Boot applications.

Extensions.Name: Code Spell Checker
Extensions.Author: Street Side Software
Extensions.Description: Spell checks code, json files, etc.

Extensions.Name: Dev Containers
Extensions.Author: Microsoft
Extensions.Description: Open any folder or repository inside a Docker container and take advantage of Visual Studio Code's full feature set.

Extensions.Name: Rainbow CSV
Extensions.Author: mechatroner
Extensions.Description: Color codes comma-separated value files to make them more readable.

Extensions.Name: YAML
Extensions.Author: Red Hat
Extensions.Description: Comprehensive language support for YAML.

Extensions.Name: Prettier - Code formatter
Extensions.Author: Prettier
Extensions.Description: As the name implies, this is a code formatter extension meant to help with code styling.

Extensions.Name: Inline fold
Extensions.Author: Mohammed Alamri
Extensions.Description: Allows you to minimize tailwind css code in your html for a less cluttered look.

Extensions.Name: Python
Extensions.Author: Microsoft
Extensions.Description: Python language support lets run, debug, etc. python code.

Extensions.Name: Pylance
Extensions.Author: Microsoft
Extensions.Description: Feature-rich python language support. Helps you do language specific things.

Extensions.Name: Python Debugger
Extensions.Author: Microsoft
Extensions.Description: Helps debug python code

Extensions.Name: Python Debugger
Extensions.Author: Microsoft
Extensions.Description: Helps debug python code

Extensions.Name: SML Environment
Extensions.Author: Vinicius Juli√£o
Extensions.Description: Will help you to write and execute SML code when you take CSC 434.

Extensions.Name: Prolog
Extensions.Author: Peng Lv
Extensions.Description: Will help you to write and execute Prolog code when you take CSC 434.

Extensions.Name: Docx/ODT Viewer
Extensions.Author: Shahil Kumar
Extensions.Description: Allows you to view docx files in VSCode.
